name: HomeButler
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill you'll be able to connect your Home Assistant to Alexa: in just a few clicks you'll be able to control all your accessories with your voice.

Do your lights, switches and sensors work on your Home Assistant instance? Then they will be available through Alexa!
All you have to do is expose your Home Assistant instance to the internet, sign up to Home Butler at homebutler.app and you're golden: just link your Home Butler account to Alexa and it will work like magic.
